reviews.customers_say: Customers find the waffle knit shirt comfortable, well-made, and super soft, with a great fit and lightweight design. They appreciate its style and versatility, with one customer noting it works well as both a dress-up and dress-down piece. The size receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfectly oversized while others say it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and soft!!
items.body: Bought this for a new work sweater and it is very soft and comfy and is long in the back so you could wear it with leggings and it covers you up! Will be getting more colors! Read more
items.author: Lauren Shafer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality shirt
items.body: Great quality shirt! Good material, pretty heavy for winter but it runs big. I bought a large for the baggy look but shouldn't have. Stick with your regular size and it'll be baggy enough. Read more
items.author: Karen Watson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slippery
items.body: This shirt is so soft and comfortable. My problem is that it’s a little big and tends to move too much with wearing it so I find myself pulling it down quite often. Read more
items.author: Sheila A. Maxwell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A closet staple
items.body: Perfect oversized fit! Looked good with leggings and jeans. I’m 5’6 140 bought size small. Read more
items.author: hannah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snags easily
items.body: Comfy, fits well, nicely oversized. However the material snags easily and after just one wear I have a few snags right on the front that make this unwearable in public. Read more
items.author: Nicole K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loveable
items.body: I love this thing. 'Course, you gotta love bell sleeves, which I do - and I like room, head-turning style and the kind of comfortable medium-weight sweater that captures attention. This has it all - The look, quality and thickness (on a spring day) that will make you happy whatever your size. Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm comfort
items.body: This green waffle long sleeve shirt is comfortable, light, pretty Kelly green and warm. The feel of the fabric next to the skin is soft. The shirt is light weight, but it is warm to wear. The color is a nice Kelly Green that hasn’t faded thru multiple washes. The size was great. The shirt moves with me and there is no binding or bunching. I have gotten compliments while wearing it. I am happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: C Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great blouse, wear often
items.body: I like everything I have gotten from Dokotoo. A great, washable, every day blouse. Their fabrics can be depended on. Read more
items.author: Virginia Sanders Mylius

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Blue, Hot Pink, Light Green, Black, Orange, Red, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Sail Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
